title: Content Box
description: Component to display content in a condensed, boxed form

headline.title: Headline
headline.description: Topic for the content box. Displayed before the text, in bold

text.title: Text content
examples: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Lorem ispum dolor distinctio minima unde voluptatum aut. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

ratio.title: Image ratio
ratio.description: Choose one of the set ratios, all ratios except `none` stretch the image to 100% width

alignement.title: Alignment
alignement.description: Choose an alignment for the box. For the image it only applies for a `ratio` value of `none`

image.title: Image source
image.description: Select an image to display inside the content box, at the top

className.title: Additional Classes
className.description: Add additional css classes that should be applied to the content box
